text: The canton of Abbeville-2 is an administrative division of the Somme department, in northern France. It was created at the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015. Its seat is in Abbeville.Décret n° 2014-263 du 26 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département de la Somme It consists of the following communes: #Abbeville (partly) #Acheux-en-Vimeu #Arrest #Béhen #Boismont #Bray-lès- Mareuil #Cahon #Cambron #Eaucourt-sur-Somme #Épagne-Épagnette #Ercourt #Estrébœuf #Franleu #Grébault-Mesnil #Huchenneville #Mareuil-Caubert #Miannay #Mons-Boubert #Moyenneville #Quesnoy-le-Montant #Saigneville #Saint-Valery- sur-Somme #Tœufles #Tours-en-Vimeu #Yonval ==References== Category:Cantons of Somme (department)
title: Canton of Abbeville-2
